text: James revealed it was 20 years since the premiere of Dawson ’ s Creek and now we ’ re sad ( Picture : MediaPunch / REX / Shutterstock ) Here ’ s something that ’ ll make you feel super old : It ’ s been 20 years since the premiere of Dawson ’ s Creek. The little TV show that made stars out of James Van Der Beek, Katie Holmes, Michelle Williams and Joshua Jackson was first shown on WB on 20 January 1998. And to celebrate the show ’ s 20th anniversary James – who, you might remember, played lead character Dawson Leery – took to Instagram to post an epic throwback pic and reminisce about the show that ‘ changed our lives and launched our careers ’.
